title: aLavillayE
sahitya:
aLavillaiyE neelaayadaakshi

aDimaiyiDam vaadaa pOdaadaa paTTa tuyar

(aLa)



anupallavi



uLamiRangi anbarkku udavum aruL veLLam

enRu ulagu pugazh taayE unadaDiyEnM

paDu tuyargaLu nOygaLum

(aLa)



caraNam



padamE gatiyena nambi vandum

bava nOy migundaal ninperumai kazhalO

nidamum uDai tarum unDi taarum enRu

neecariDam senRu yaacagattiRku ninRadu

(aLa)
